name: Trench Knife (TK)
description: A trench knife is a combat knife designed to kill or incapacitate an enemy at close quarters. The trench knife may have a standard, single-edged blade that is suitable for stabbing and slashing or a triangular blade that is only suitable for stabbing. Both variants typically have a handguard that offers protection for the knuckles.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
